name: 電脳劇団ムー一座第3回公演 祭の夜の夢
summary: Main heroine lost her parents early and was brought up in a neighbor family that had a boy in it. The fresh siblings grow up and one day go to a festival there. There is a bad premonition about the kappa monster on the pond lurking here, but heroes still make their way there...
info:
• 平台: WIN
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 2000-12-21
  • ブランド: Artifact
  • シナリオ: 江戸久代
  • 原画: 松竹 徳幸
